infos.value: Ngh... Urgh!
Sterne, my son. Does your wound pain you?
Ugh...
Let us leave here at once. We shall give your wounds time to heal and then start things afresh.
What is the matter, Muraga?
I'll kill, kill yer, kill... Kill 'em all, kill...
King...Muraga!?
Argh... Aaah! King Muraga, I beg of you!
Can't...suppress it. Need to...slaughter...
(Sterne's armor feeds on the power of hatred, while the magic equipment I gifted to Muraga feeds on humiliation. Alas...)
(That was a poor choice. Its power has built up beyond my expectations. He may well explode in violence at any moment.)
Muraga... How do you fare?
Kill. Slay. Butcher. Kill...
Muraga...?
Lord Sadali... Please give me a task...
This impulse... I can't stop it. Need to destroy. Need to kill.
I understand. Please withdraw at once.
Withdraw? No, I can't do that. I...
Withdrawing is not the same as fleeing.
I would like you to build a fortress at the border.
A fortress...for the Wezette invasion?
Precisely.
So long as Wezette surrenders, all will be resolved shortly.
Alas, if they do not, then we will destroy them along with Leonis. Naught but their ashes shall remain...
Yes, Lord Sadali.
Meanwhile, Montâ€”
(*Yelling*)
(*Shouting*)
